channel.title: Paramiko on Nuttaphat Arunoprayoch
channel.description: Recent content in Paramiko on Nuttaphat Arunoprayoch

item.title: Handle Interactive Shell
item.description: Introduction Connecting to a remote service using a python module paramiko has always been one of the well-known methods to handle such tasks. Executing commands and receiving the data from the connected server can be done quickly. The following code is a primary usage of paramiko to interact with the server. import paramiko host = '127.0.0.1' # server host username = 'root' password = 'root' # Init SSH client client = paramiko.
